title: 4/18/17 - What Will Your Legacy Be? & Allen West on Dealing With North Korea
description:
What will your legacy be? ...Who was Robert Godwin? ...Words of love and forgiveness from a victim's family ...Kim Jong-un has a plan for Americans ...Col. Allen West on how to deal with North Korea ...The comedy genius of Dave Chappelle ...Greatest comedian today?...The weird ways North Korea uses technology ...

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
